organisation_name: SIBA SOFT INFORMATION SYSTEMS AND BUSINESS ORGANIZATION COMMERCIAL SA (SIBA SOFT SA)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
Our CEO Mrs. Eleni Theodoridou is General Secretary of the  
Hellenic Health Informatics Association  
http://www.espy.org.gr/el
relevant_communication:
We collaborate with other stakeholders from the public and private sectors, clinicians, public hospitals, administrators, investors, patient’s advocacy groups, cities, and municipalities to help influence policy and legislation within the EU and EC in order to participate in EU projects and initiatives.  
 
We work with public hospitals, state and local officials, private stakeholders and researchers to help advance the eHealth ecosystem in Greece and other countries in the region.  We sponsor and participate in initiatives nationally, in Europe, the US and the Middle East such as eHealth Week, eHealth Forum, US Select Missions and others. 
 
Through our products and services, we want to help integrate eHealth applications and help promote IT solutions as a priority in Greece's national strategy.  
 
We are exploring partnerships with other cities to build and provide services that support independent living and better quality of life for citizens. We want to be among the leaders of integrating innovation solutions that make health a priority and incorporate eHealth in daily life. 
 
We have developed cutting edge solutions to help mitigate the humanitarian crisis, assist clinicians, organisations and state officials manage aid funds and resources while helping patients and refugees in dire need find the help they require. 
  
We want to help promote and solutions to encourage digital skills for patients and healthcare professionals.
goals__remit:
SIBA Soft has been investing in new technologies since 2013 and has developed a series of web-based products and other solutions such as Portable PHRs, revolving around the most effective ways of creating and maintaining a patient’s medical file.   
 
Today are goals are: 
- To expand our business in developed markets (Europe and USA).  
- To join and help implement EU projects and initiatives in Greece and other EU cities/regions 
- To expand our business to markets of developing countries and more specifically to the sub-Saharan Africa region.   
- To cooperate with other IT companies which will operate complementary to our products and knowhow, such as companies with Virtual Reality or 3D animation software, in order to offer new expansion perspectives.  
- To find at least one academic strategic partner in the Health Sector, such as a University Hospital which conducts clinical trials and research, in order to finalize our algorithms for patient summaries and clinical support systems. 
- To find at least one strategic partner in the Pharmaceutical Sector.   
- To expand our client base.  
- To double our annual revenue.
